subject: Management
title: The DESC Script
description: A 60-second lesson on The DESC Script.

hook.text: A team lead dreaded a confrontation. She had no structure for what to say. So she said nothing.

buildup.text: Without a framework, difficult conversations spiral or stall. Structure helps.

discovery.text: DESC: Describe the behavior, Express the impact, Specify what you need, state Consequences.

twist.text: It's not a script to read robotically. It's a backbone that keeps you focused under stress.

climax.text: When you interrupt in meetings, I lose my train of thought. Can you hold questions to the end?

punchline.text: A framework turns dread into a plan.

quiz.question: What does the DESC framework stand for?
